thread.title: Mr. Michael Hyman
thread.title_full: tyresonthedrive.com reviewed by Mr. Michael Hyman

author: Mr. Michael Hyman
title: Mr. Michael Hyman
text: This was the first time that I had used tyresonthedrive.com. It was easy to arrange the service online and the prices were competitive. I was impressed by the fact that Jon and Liam 'phoned to say that they could manage to get to me earlier than planned and was further impressed by the clean and very professional look of the van, which gave me good confidence. The work was completed without any mess and the run flat tyres that I had ordered were fitted without problem. This is much easier than booking into a garage and sitting around waiting!
